title: Must be level 5 to comment?
body:
I'm trying to comment on that Music Cover Contest and it's saying I have to be level 5 to comment.. 

I'm level 168. What am I supposed to do? Is it a different level meaning than your acc? Is it a boards only level thing? 

Help, please?

replies.body: Late response, but I just wanted to add a little note that the Boards will soon be automatically syncing players regularly, reducing the confusion behind a lot of these errors :) Sorry for the inconvenience!
I believe posting in H and S should sync your level (it is meant to be the same as in game). Try again now you've posted here and see if it's fixed.
